title: HTA Workshop 2025: Health Technology Assessment
venue: Mysore Medical College and Research Institute, Mysore
coordinator: Department of Community Medicine, MMC&RI Mysore

resource_person.name: Dr Siddalingaiah H S
resource_person.institution: Mysore Medical College and Research Institute

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamental principles and concepts of Health Technology Assessment
Apply various economic evaluation frameworks including cost-effectiveness analysis
Master methodologies for measuring healthcare resource use and costs
Learn techniques for valuing different health outcomes (QALY, DALY)
Develop skills in interpreting and synthesizing economic evidence
Gain expertise in translating HTA findings into healthcare policy decisions
Apply HTA methodologies to Indian healthcare context and resource constraints
target_audience: Postgraduate medical residents, healthcare professionals, and researchers
prerequisites: Basic understanding of epidemiology and biostatistics
certification: Certificate of participation from NAMSCON and MMC&RI
accommodation: Accommodation will be arranged for outstation participants at MMC Guest House
